name: Visioncore
overview: Founded in 2002 and headquartered in Hoffman Estates, IL, Vizioncore Inc. is a fully owned subsidiary of Quest Software (NASDAQ: QSFT), a leading systems management vendor. Vizioncoreâ€™s operations span the Americas, EMEA, Asia and Australia. Vizioncore provides server virtualization management solutions that help customers protect, control and manage their IT systems while allowing them to extract the maximum return on their investment in virtualization. Vizioncoreâ€™s products are built from the ground up to support virtual environments with none of the legacy encumbrances of products built for physical servers. Over 18,000 organizations around the world, from SMBs to large-scale enterprises, use Vizioncoreâ€™s products. Vizioncore operates independently and distributes its products through an extended partner network of 2,200 value-added resellers worldwide.
